featured.text: David’s new book made it to the best-seller list because of its beautiful ______ and amusing stories.
Learn to Lighten Up and Live Longer, the best seller of the month, has several good suggestions.

definition.zh_def: 賣家；出售商品或服務的人或公司。
definition.en_def: A person or company that sells goods or services.
definition.example: The seller agreed to lower the price of the car.
